data.title: How to Come
data.text:
For some years now, we've been encouraging you to travel to our events by train whenever possible. You can book your tickets directly on SNCF Connect.

2h30 from Paris

5h20 from Bordeaux

5h26 from Lyon

Car Parks

The P13 car park, located just behind the Quai St Malo, is available to exhibitors and guests for the duration of the event. Around 70 cars can be parked here.

Saint-Malo is :

1 hour from Rennes by car,

2 hours from Nantes by car,

4 hours from Paris by car.

Rennes airport is 50 minutes away by car.

⚠️ Parking costs are not covered by the organization.

Taxis

ALLO TAXIS SAINT-MALO : 02-99-81-30-30

ALLO LES TAXIS BLEUS : 02-99-19-87-87

ABC TAXI / TONIFLOCA : 06-10-03-18-86

TAXI JORDAN : 07-86-25-69-70

ALLO ARNAUD TAXI : 06-76-54-72-32

By Bus

From the station to Quai St Malo and Palais du Grand Large:

Lines 1 & 2 - every 7 minutes

A hostess will be on hand to distribute bus tickets valid for 2 trips (round trip):

Tuesday June 18 and Wednesday June 19 (morning) at the SNCF station

Thursday 20th from 12pm to 6pm at the Quai St Malo partner reception desk.

Bus to hotels along the Sillon beach Line 6 - from the "Intra-Muros" stop

For L'escale Oceania and Beaufort hotels: "Digue" stop

For Best Western Alexandra: "Pasteur" stop

(Reserved for guests up to a maximum of €235 incl. VAT).

To have actually participated in Top Logistics Europe between June 25 and 26, 2025.

To have read and accepted the general conditions and rules of participation.

To have made a minimum of 10 qualified appointments with our partners over the 2 days.

No reimbursement will be made for parking tickets, mileage allowances or cab, bus, Orlyval and RATP expenses. Any change of train/flight will be charged to the guest.
